QuickTips.1: Canned response are pre-made messages you can recall easily during chat.
QuickTips.2: If you often reply to the same customer questions, consider saving those replies as canned responses.
QuickTips.3: With canned responses, you type it once, save it and reuse it in chats whenever you need.
QuickTips.4: You can also create a more engaging experience for your customers by using personalization in your message:
QuickTips.5: 1) When editing a message, you can insert a personalization field by first selecting the area in which you'd like to create the field.
QuickTips.6: 2) Next, click the ADD PERSONALIZATION button
QuickTips.7: 3) Clicking the ADD PERSONALIZATION button will provide a list where you can select which personalization value you would like to add to your message.
